tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: From the very start I felt I was sitting across a desk talking to a friend and getting all the sisterly advice. Not only is Dr.Smitha blessed to have the patience in answering to all my myriad stupid-silly questions but she also successfully got my frantic mum calm down who was panic stricken with my diet .lol. Yes, and it isn't easy to convince my mum unless you're qualified enough:DShe's also been like that coach who gives you that punch of motivation when you're getting it all wrong. Yes, I've had times when I wasn't too regular with my exercises and skipped my meds cause of my schedule but she's always there with an internal checklist  and give you the facts and get you back on track. She's a cool gynaec who know's her game. You go gal!!ðŸ˜Ž So all you ladies out there..if you want somebody to take you through this bitter sweet experience called pregnancy and make it less stressful and more positive  then you need someone like Dr.Smitha. Totally recommend her!! (P.S I didn't get paid to talk like this)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She was very helpful in really making me understand what exactly is the problem with my symptoms. Also explained about how it has happened and what to do on regular bases to pump up my body strength for it to normally fade away. She also did not put me on high medicines since it wasnâ€™t really required and I completely appreciate that. Because hormonal tablets can cause the body to change. I was very impressed when after the check up she told me to get back to her after the dosage days are completed  to inform her on my health. She was friendly, ************* and caring though my problem was just a beginning. Trust happens when you are told the right thing without hiding or missing out on points. That is what has happened to me with her. I am glad I have had the opportunity to be under her guidance for my health issue. I would definitely recommend her to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Smitha has very **** ********* *** ** **** experienced. I went to dr smitha first for NT scan and now for TIFFA. Doctor made me comfortable during the scan. Explained everything about first trimester screening in detail during nt scan. Showed me all the babies parts during tiffa scan. She is very approachable and We need more doctors like this. Doctor answered all my questions with a lot of patience. Thank you Dr Smitha. Keep doing the good work !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Labor and Delivery,
review: Dr. Smitha is very friendly. She has helped us through out our pregnancy, delivery and also post delivery. She is very patient enough to listen to our silly queries/doubts/questions and give her answer accordingly. Me and my Husband blindly trusted on Dr. Smitha and Dr. Prathima Reddy for their experience and their explanation about diet, about Medicine prescribed, tests to be taken. We felt we are in the safe hands.  We are 100 % satisfied with Dr. Smitha's service.
